content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GenerateCredentials path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/storage/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/users/{user_id}/credentials/generate content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name userid
desc a user id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum create credentials
desc generate storage credentials for the given user users can only have one set of credentials calling this method will generate a new set and invalidate any existing ones
responses
200
storagegeneratecredentialsresponse
type obj
props
accesskey
type str
desc the id for the access key
secretkey
type str
desc the secret key used to sign requests
desc a response with new credentials
title: 31_User Credentials_GenerateCredentials_174.json
